short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For quizzes on cuLearn marked as review only, CUiz Yourself masks answers with a button so you dont see the answer right away!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FOR ALL CARLETON UNIVERSITY STUDENTS

If you are reviewing a quiz on cuLearn that is marked as review only you cant actually complete the quiz again. It is also hard to test yourself again as the answers are right there in front of you.

Meet "CUiz Yourself" the one stop chrome extension to help you review your quizzes. Simply go on a quiz you would like to review and a button will appear asking if you want to hide all answers. You can click on it and answers will be hidden. You can then choose to unhide all answers or individual ones.

Happy studying!
